effect.Name: Color Dodge (Background)
effect.description: (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Looks at the color information in each channel and brightens the base color to reflect the blend color by decreasing contrast between the two. Blending with black produces no change
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Color Dodge (Background) Shader | 1.2 (30.06.2024) */
parameter.description: (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Looks at the color information in each channel and brightens the base color to reflect the blend color by decreasing contrast between the two. Blending with black produces no change

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.
